# How to nest generated files in VSCode

Do you have a lot of code-generated files and want to hide them by default the project explorer?

Just enable file nesting in the VSCode settings and you're good to go! ğŸš€

Very useful if you use build_runner, Freezed, or json_serializable in your Flutter apps. ğŸ‘Œ
